page.title: File
page.introduction: The File menu allows the user to perform several file operations on the currently open VCell Document.
page.operations:
Clicking the File menu displays a popup menu with the following choices:
New,
Open,
Close - closes the currently open document,
Save - saves the current document in the database, overwriting the older version. Note that this menu option is disabled for a new document. For saving a new document, refer to Save As.
Save New Version - saves document as a new version (with same name but latest time stamp),
Save As,
Revert To Saved,
Compare With Saved - compares the currently open document with its latest saved version in the database and displays the result in a separate window. Refer to the section on Manage Database -> Compare With for further information.
Permissions...,
Model Annotation...,
Edit Annotation...,
Manage Database...,
Field Data...,
Import...,
Export...,
Exit - exits the Virtual Cell, closing all open documents and prompting user to save any unsaved document(s).
